Description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Ultimate Membership Pro: from n/a through 12.6.

A timing-based username enumeration vulnerability exists in Fides Webserver authentication in Fides 2.44.0. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to determine the existence of a user on the system by sending a series of authentication requests with different usernames.

A blocklist bypass vulnerability exists in the LaTeX functionality of Ankitects Anki 24.04. A specially crafted malicious flashcard can lead to an arbitrary file creation at a fixed path. An attacker can share a malicious flashcard to trigger this vulnerability.

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Unified Communications Manager (Unified CM) and Cisco Unified Communications Manager Session Management Edition (Unified CM SME) could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks against the web-based management interface of an affected device.
Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Learning with Texts (LWT) 2.0.3 due to the application not filtering special characters in URL parameters.
Improper Privilege Management in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Privilege Escalation.
Deserialization of Untrusted Data in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Object Injection.

A blocklist bypass vulnerability exists in the LaTeX functionality of Ankitects Anki 24.04. A specially crafted malicious flashcard can lead to an arbitrary file creation at a fixed path. An attacker can share a malicious flashcard to trigger this vulnerability without user interaction.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Privilege Escalation. This issue affects Ultimate Membership Pro: from n/a through 12.6.
Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Object Injection. This issue affects Ultimate Membership Pro: from n/a through 12.6.

A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Unified Communications Manager (Unified CM) and Cisco Unified Communications Manager Session Management Edition (Unified CM SME) could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to conduct directory traversal attacks on an affected device. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the affected device. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to read arbitrary files on the system.

A local privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the Windows kernel that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on affected systems. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by executing a specially crafted application on a target system. A successful exploit would allow the attacker to execute code with elevated privileges.

A local privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the Windows kernel that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on affected systems. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by executing a specially crafted application on a target system. A successful exploit would allow the attacker to execute code with elevated privileges.

A local privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the Windows kernel that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges on affected systems. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by executing a specially crafted application on a target system. A successful exploit would allow the attacker to execute code with elevated privileges.
An authenticated user could traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.
An authenticated user could create scheduler tasks that would allow them to escalate their privileges to administrator due to missing authentication.
An authenticated user could upload and execute arbitrary files which could be executed on the underlying operating system.
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in azzaroco Ultimate Membership Pro allows Privilege Escalation.**This issue affects Ultimate Membership Pro: from n/a through 12.6.**
CWE Mapping: CWE-250: Execution with Unrestricted File System Access
CWE-434: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
